Lyric:
[00:03.270]HEROS
[00:05.270]
[00:17.300]I, I wish you could swim
[00:25.840]Like the dolphins, like dolphins can swim
[00:33.140]Though nothing, nothing will keep us together
[00:42.490]We can beat them, for ever and ever
[00:50.130]Oh we can be Heroes, just for one day
[01:16.820]I, I will be king
[01:29.580]And you, you will be queen
[01:33.870]Though nothing will drive them awaqy
[01:42.070]We can beat them, just for one day
[01:45.350]We can be Heroes, just for one day
[02:00.660]I, I can remember (I remember)
[02:08.540]Standing, by the wall (by the wall)
[02:17.090]And the guns, shot above our heads (over our heads)
[02:25.260]And we kissed, as though nothing could fall (nothing could fall)
[02:33.830]And the shame, was on the other side
[02:42.120]Oh we can beat them, for ever and ever
[02:50.240]Then we could be Heroes, just for one day
[03:03.330]We can be Heroes
[03:11.630]We can be Heroes
[03:20.070]We can be Heroes
[03:24.360]Just for one day
[03:28.290]We can be Heroes
